# Time is of the essence: effectiveness of dairy farm control strategies for H5N1 are limited by fast spread

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository hosts the code, data and supporting analysis for "Time is of the essence: effectiveness of dairy farm control strategies for H5N1 are limited by fast spread."
The analysis was structured in the form of an R package to facilitate reproducibility.

## Installation

You can install the development version of rRsurveillance from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("wf-id/h5n1speed")
```
